title: Old man: returning to Lake Condah Mission
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
abstract: Local Elder, Uncle Kenny, remembers his childhood at Lake Condah Mission.
description: This is a documentary film about growing up on Lake Condah Aboriginal Mission. A local Elder, Uncle Kenny Saunders, visits the site of Lake Condah Mission and talks about his childhood memories revealing a past of cruelty and fear, and the devastation felt in the aftermath of the Eumerella massacres.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006779; First Hand: five films; Active; 2005
